Description: He claims he has no interest in the Seven Against Nidah. [Reduce this to 0 to change his mind.]
ChangeDescriptionText: 2|When you finish your tale, Batuk asks a question. He contemplates your answer.~1|Batuk attends closely as you speak.~0|After your tale, Batuk springs to his feet and paces the cavity.~4|Batuk claims he will not rejoin the Seven.~3|Batuk feigns indifference, but you you can tell he's listening.
Name: $Ambition -> 大望$Ambition: Batuk's Indifference
